Text: I don't remember who I downloaded it from, but when I ran a virus scan after downloading the VisualBoyAdvance Emulator, VBA/Generic.src showed up as a virus.  I just thought I'd post this to warn people.
Well, next time make sure you know where it's from and write the comment on their torrent... Thank to the uploader and I will continue to seed this as long as possible.

VisualBoyAdvance is the best EMU of all times (of couse when we're talking about GBA-roms)

For everyone who needs an EMU for SNES roms, I recomend Zsnes EMU :)
And for NES I recomend Nesticle (Enjoy)
You  should not download the emulator from torrents, use their website instead. Just google it.
FCE ultra for Nes i like best,it couldn't be easier and yes VBA is the best  GBA player alright:)
and its dawn of souls not sorrows:/
